title: Hunt Builds Carbon Road & Gravel Wheels for Classified Powershift drivetrains
content:
Thanks to a new partnership between Hunt x Classified, you can now order two of Hunt’s top-selling carbon aero road or lightweight gravel racing wheelsets…

The post Hunt Builds Carbon Road & Gravel Wheels for Classified Powershift drivetrains <£1000 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
